metadata.title: CVE-2020-27825 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in kernel/trace/ring_buffer.c in Linuxkernel (before 5.10-rc1). There was a race problem in trace_open and resizeof cpu buffer running parallely on different cpus, may cause a denial ofservice problem (DOS). This flaw could even allow a local attacker withspecial user privilege to a kernel information leak threat.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
